description.en:
PAZZY will be the first cryptocurrency company to provide social media users with an array of innovative and revolutionary tools and features to monetize their social media presence. Pazzy’s tools can be used on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, YouTube, Snapchat, WeChat, Telegram and many others.

Whilst existing solutions solve just one problem at a time, the PAZZY platform will offer the ability to monetize and earn from an existing social media presence, with an array of easy-to-use and revolutionary tools and features, helping cryptocurrency payments become the norm on social media.
